scripts.typecheck: bun run --filter "packages/*" --if-present typecheck && bun run --filter "apps/tui" --if-present typecheck
scripts.build: bun run --filter "packages/*" --if-present build && bun run --filter "apps/tui" --if-present build
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd packages/protean lint && bun run --cwd apps/tui lint && bun run --cwd apps/webapp lint
scripts.test: bun run --filter "packages/*" --if-present test && bun run --filter "apps/tui" --if-present test
